text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1970. ==Events== *21 June - Brazil beat Italy 4-1 to win the 1970 World Cup at Mexico City, Mexico. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Births== *19 May - Daniel Boaventura, actor & singer ==Deaths== ==See also== *1970 in Brazil *List of Brazilian films of 1970
title: 1970 in Brazilian television
